comments:
I recently wrote my own program to generate reports from command line. The program works fine in eclipse but does not work on HP-UX. I have pasted the error i get when i run the program under unix below. Any Ideas on what is causing the problem.

Hi Ravi,

It looks as if org.eclipse.birt.core.data.DataTypeUtil has not be successfully initialized.

I am not sure how you run the program on HP-UX. Do you mean the program is runable in eclipse in windows but failed in eclipse in HP-UX?

Any further information would be helpful.

Thanks.
Lin

Hi Ravi,

As I've not received your reply yet, I assume that you have fixed the problem. This bug will be closed. Please feel free to reopen it in case of necessary.

Thanks.
Lin
